name: Artifact_AeonCloakItem
description: When in combat, an Aeon wearing this cloak distorts time and space in 30 feet area. Each round enemies have to pass a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + mythic rank + Wisdom modifier ) or be slowed for one round, as per slow spell. Allies instead are under a constant haste spell effect. They also gain a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

name: Artifact_AngelCloakItem
description: When an Angel wears this cloak, his Sword of Heaven ability deals an additional 4 dice of damage or heal an additional 4 dice of damage instead of 2.

name: Artifact_AzataCloakItem
description: Azata shares a bond with her dragon. 50% damage is redirected to Aivu. In addition, Aivu gets additional DR N/- where N is equal to Azata's mythic rank.

name: Artifact_DemonCloakItem
description: Demon Rage and Demon Aspects now grant bonuses as if you were 3 mythic ranks higher.

name: Artifact_DevilCloakItem
description: This cloak grants Devil 3 additional uses of Hell's Seal per day.

name: Artifact_DragonCloakItem
description: This cloak grants Dragon 2 additional spell slots for the 9th level spells. In addition, Dragon's breath deals additional 20 Divine damage and its DC is increased by 2.

name: Artifact_LegendCloakItem
description: This Cloak allows Legend to reroll any skill check and take the best result from both throws.

name: Artifact_LichCloakItem
description: When Lich wears this cloak his Lord Beyond the Grave grants additional +4 bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Charisma ability scores.

name: Artifact_LocustCloakItem
description: Whenever one of the Locust's clones dies, it spawns a CR 18 Locust Swarm after itslef, which attacks your enemies to the best of its abilities for 3 minutes.

name: Artifact_TricksterCloakItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak fails a saving throw, they get a +10 bonus on all skill checks and saving throws for 1 round. However, the wearer gets sad afterwards and suffers a -1 penalty to AC, attack and damage rolls until the end of the next combat.

name: BlackFurCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +10 competence bonus to all Stealth checks and cold resistance 30.

enchant.name: BlackFurCloakEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillStealth (descriptor: Competence)

name: BlackKnightCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC, a +4 resistance bonus to all saves, a +4 enhancement bonus to Persuasion skill checks when used to intimidate, and a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls against shaken targets. Can be used only by characters of evil alignment.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

enchant.name: BlackKnightCloakEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to CheckIntimidate (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: BloodClarityItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak of resistance +2 lands a killing blow, they gain immunity to mind-affecting conditions for 3 rounds.

name: CallToViolenceItem
description: This cloak of resistance +4 also grants its wearer a 30 feet aura which grants all enraged allies in the area a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls.

name: CapeOfDesinsectorItem
description: This cloak of resistance +2 grants the wearer DR 5/- against all swarms' attacks.

name: CapeOfDivinationItem
description: This cape increases by 3 the DC of all Divination school spells cast by the wearer.

name: CelestialProtectionItem
description: This cloak grants the wearer a +5 resistance bonus on saving throws against demons and a +5 competence bonus on Lore (Religion) skill checks.

enchant.name: CelestialProtectionEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillLoreReligion (descriptor: Competence)

name: CloakFromThickPeltItem
description: This cloak of resistance +2 grants the wearer immunity to fire.

name: CloakOfArcaneReservesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak suffers ability damage, next time they cast a spell, its caster level and the difficulty of saving throws against it are increased by 2.

name: CloakOfAstoundingProwessItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak of resistance +5 lands a killing blow, all enemies in a 15 feet radius must pass a Will saving throw (DC 32) or become blinded for 4 rounds.

name: CloakOfBloodScentItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak of resistance +2 is under a Rage effect, they gain a +2 attack bonus on attack rolls against wounded enemies.

name: CloakOfCarnageItem
description: This cloak grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge

enchant.name: CloakOfCaranageEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Competence)

name: CloakOfCleansingItem
description: This cloak of resistance +2 additionally grants the wearer a +2 bonus on saving throws against compulsion and disease effects.

name: CloakOfDarkestRitesItem
description: This cloak enhances lich's Dark Rites ability, granting additional +2 bonus to DC and a +2 profane bonus to AC to lich and his companions while the ability is active.

name: CloakOfDisguiseItem
description: This cloak of resistance +1 also grants its wearer a +3 competence bonus to Stealth skill checks.

name: CloakOfEfficientInvisibilityItem
description: The wearer of this cloak thinks she is invisible, but that's an illusion.

name: CloakOfHeroism
description: This cloak grants its wearer the ability to cast heroism spell once per day as a 2nd level wizard.

name: CloakOfInnerWarmthItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer acid resistance 30 and cold resistance 30.

name: CloakOfLoneWolfItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak has no enemies or allies around in a 10 feet area, they get a +3 bonus to damage rolls on their ranged attacks and a +2 bonus on all saving throws.

name: CloakOfResistance1
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfResistance2
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfResistance3
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +3 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfResistance4
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfResistance5
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfResistance6
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +6 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfSacredStudiesItem
description: This cloak of resistance +5 grants its wearer a +12 competence bonus on Lore (Religion) and Knowledge (Arcane) skill checks.

name: CloakOfSeerItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +3 deflection bonus to AC, a +3 bonus to Fortitude and Will saving throws, and an ability to cast see invisibility spell once per day as a 3rd level wizard.

enchant.name: Fortitude3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SaveFortitude (descriptor: Resistance)

enchant.name: Will3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SaveWill (descriptor: Resistance)

enchant.name: Deflection3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: CloakOfShadows
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +10 enhancement bonus to all Stealth skill checks, and immunity to blindness and dazzling.

enchant.name: Stealth10
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillStealth (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: CloakOfSparklesItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer fire resistance 30 and electricity resistance 30.

name: CloakOfStagLord
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws and cold resistance 10. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: CloakOfStrongWilledItem
description: This cloak grants the wearer a +3 resistance bonus on Will saving throws.

enchant.name: CloakOfStrongWilledEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SaveWill (descriptor: Resistance)

name: CloakOfTheAncientHeraldItem
description:
Whenever the wearer of this cloak channels energy to heal, the wearer gains a +2 bonus to Persuasion skill checks, and the save DC of spells with compulsion descriptor they cast is increased by 2. This effect lasts the number of rounds equal to the character's level.
Whenever the wearer of this cloak channels energy to harm, the affected creatures have to pass a Will saving throw or be dazed for one round. Save DC = 10 + half character level + Charisma modifier.

name: CloakOfTheBearItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 resistance bonus on all saving throws and a +4 competence bonus to CMD.

enchant.name: CloakOfTheBearEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AdditionalCMD (descriptor: Competence)

name: CloakOfTheChosenItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer immunity to blindness and dazzle, a +3 resistance bonus on Will saving throws, and the ability to cast prayer spell at will as a 9th level cleric.

enchant.name: Will3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SaveWill (descriptor: Resistance)

name: CloakOfTheLion
description: This cloak gives its wearer a +3 resistance bonus on all saving throws. If the wearer is Lawful Good, this bonus is increased to +5. If the wearer is a paladin, they gain an ability to spend one use of their Smite Evil ability to grant all allies in the range of 20 feet immunity to fear effects for the number of rounds equal to the wearer's paladin level.

name: CloakOfTheWinterWolfItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak makes a successful bite attack, it deals additional 1d6 cold damages and trips the target.

name: CloakWyvernItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to natural armor and +4 resistance bonus on saving throws against poison, sleep and paralysis.

name: ContagiousShroudItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak is attacked in melee, the attacker must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 29) or become sickened and vulnerable to acid for 4 rounds. This effect can only occur once per attacker during a combat.

name: DervishCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus to Knowledge (World) and Knowledge (Arcana) skill checks, and a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

enchant.name: DervishCloakEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeWorld (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Competence)

enchant.name: Charisma2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: DungeoneersCloakItem
description: This cloak of resistance +5 grants its wearer a +15 competence bonus on Trickery skill checks as well as resistance 5 to all elements.

name: EnchantersCapeItem
description: This cape grants its wearer a +1 bonus to Enchantment school spells' DC.

name: ExtraplanarCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution and the ability to cast summon monster V spell once per day for 9 rounds.

enchant.name: Constitution4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Constitution (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: GrimMantleItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws and immunity to poison.

name: HerbalistCapeItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence, a +5 competence bonus on all Lore (Nature) checks and the ability to cast delay poison spell three times per day as a 3rd level cleric.

enchant.name: Intelligence4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Intelligence (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: HerbalistCapeEcnhant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillLoreNature (descriptor: Competence)

name: HermitsCloakItem
description: This cloak grants the wearer a +6 bonus on Fortitude saving throws, a +5 competence bonus on Lore (Nature) skill checks, and cold resistance 10.

enchant.name: HermitsCloakEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillLoreNature (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 6 to SaveFortitude (descriptor: UntypedStackable)

name: HeroCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer the ability to cast heroism spell once per day as a 3rd level wizard.

name: LibrariansCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +10 competence bonus on Use Magic Device skill checks. It also increases the effective caster level by 4 when using scrolls.

enchant.name: LibrariansCloakEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Competence)

name: LivingFlameItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak channels energy to harm undead, for the next 2 rounds they become surrounded with a fire shield that deals 1d6 + character level fire damage to the attackers for each successful melee attack against the wearer.

name: MistyCoverItem
description: This cloak of resistance +4 grants the wearer +2 insight bonus to AC against flying creatures and summoned creatures.

name: PerilousShadeItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this cloak lands a killing blow, they are affected by Greater Invisibility spell as it was cast by 15th level wizard. In addition, this cloak grants a +10 competence bonus on Stealth skill checks.

name: RoguesCompanionItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus on Trickery checks and the ability to cast expeditious retreat three times per day as a 1st level wizard.

enchant.name: RoguesCompanionEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Competence)

name: RovagugSpawnCloakItem
description:
This cloak grants its wearer 50% of Fortification (providing a 50% chance to negate a critical hit or a sneak attack extra damage) and immunity to confusion, fear, paralysis and insanity. It also imbues the wearer with the powers of the Spawn of Rovagug allowing to use the Corruption of the Rough Beast ability three times per day.
Corruption of the Rough Beast applies one of the following effects to all enemies within 100 feet radius for 1d6+1 rounds

name: RulersMantleItem
description: This mantle grants its wearer a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws, and a +3 resistance bonus on saving throws against poison.

name: ScarletAllureItem
description: This red cloak of resistance +3 makes anyone look good. It grants the wearer a +5 morale bonus on Persuasion skill checks. Whenever an enemy confirms a critical hit, lands a sneak attack or attack of opportunity against the wearer, the enemy must pass a Will saving throw (DC 27) or become devastated by hitting such beauty. In this devastated mood they suffer a -2 penalty to attack and damage rolls, as well as AC, until the end of combat.

name: ShamansCloak
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws, and the ability to cast elemental body IV (earth) spell once per day as a 17th level wizard.

name: ShroudOfAbaddon
description: This cape grants its wearer a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws, fire resistance 15, cold resistance 15, electricity resistance 15 and acid resistance 15.

name: ShroudOfDecayItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer acid resistance 30 and the ability to cast acid fog spell twice per day as a 11th level wizard.

name: ShroudOfEternalMadness
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +8 enhancement bonus to Charisma and the ability to cast energy drain spell once per day as a 13th level wizard.

enchant.name: Charisma8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: SkinnedLeatherCloakItem
description: Whenever the wearer lands a hit on an enemy first time in a round, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 29) or be partially skinned. Those who fail the save become staggered and take 2 points of Constitution drain per round for 1d4 rounds.

name: ToxicWrapItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer immunity to acid. It also makes enemies sickened for 1d3 rounds upon landing a sneak attack unless they pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 26).

name: WarmEmbrace
description: This cloak grants its wearer cold resistance 10 and the ability to cast deep slumber spell one per day as a 5th level wizard.

name: WhiteKnightCloakItem
description: This cloak grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC, a +4 resistance bonus on all saving throws, a +4 enhancement bonus to Persuasion skill checks and +1 bonus to AC against evil-aligned creatures' attacks. This cloak can be worn only by good characters.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

enchant.name: WhiteKnightCloakEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: WhiteWindsCloakItem
description:
This damaged coat can now be worn only as a cloak and only by a non-evil aligned creature.
If this cloak is worn by a character with no levels in duelist class, such character will get the Precise Strike ability.
If this cloak is worn by a duelist, she gets a +4 competence bonus to attack rolls while parrying. Additionally, her Precise Strike ability now adds 1.5 of her duelist level as a bonus to her damage rolls.
It also allows the wearer to cast a sacred nimbus spell three times per day as a 9th level Cleric
Precise Strike

name: WrathOfTheUndeadItem
description: This cloak of resistance +5 grants its wearer a 60-feet aura which makes all affected enemies to pass a Will saving throw (DC 33) or become frightened for 1 minute. If the saving throw was a success, the enemy becomes shaken for 5 rounds instead. Enemies can only be affected by this aura once. In addition, this aura grants all undead allies a +4 circumstance bonus on attack rolls against enemies under fear effects and deal additional 2d6 precision damage on a successful hit against such targets.
